pr_title: Improve logging and documentation about objcopy dependency

timeline.bodyText:
Let's drop the "!" please.
And it probably needs to be a warn?
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            The generation of the `.debug` file requires `objcopy` being present in the `PATH` environment variable.
          
          
            
            The generation of the `.debug` file requires `objcopy` being available from the `PATH` environment variable.
          
      
    
    
  

The way it is written, you have the impression you need to add objcopy to PATH.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -578,6 +578,12 @@ To generate debug symbols,
 add `-Dquarkus.native.debug.enabled=true` flag when generating the native executable.
 You will find the debug symbols for the native executable in a `.debug` file next to the native executable.
 
+[NOTE]
+====
+The generation of the `.debug` file requires `objcopy` being present in the `PATH` environment variable.

replies.bodyText: I changed this part to include some more info on how to get objcopy as well.
replies.author: zakkak

timeline.message: Improve logging and documentation about objcopy dependency
Improve logging and documentation about objcopy dependency
